co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations

Class MPIAnnotations

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.annotations.MPIAnnotations

  • public final class MPIAnnotations
extends java.lang.Object
    Useful for mods with MPIs of their own but still mainly use N-API. Most of these are documentation Annotations. Only a handful are currently used at runtime.
    Author:
    Niadel

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.Dangerous
      Marks a method as being dangerous to use.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.EventHandlerMethod
      Marks a method as a method that handles a method, specifically the one it has in it's parameters.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.Internal
      Marks an annotation as being internal and not to use.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.Library
      Marks a mod as being a library.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.LoadStateMethod
      Allows for a mod method that's important to be called something other than the default preInit(), init(), and postInit().
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.ModRegister
      Somewhat analagous to Forge's @Mod annotation, only optional, and is just a shortcut rather than the fixed way of defining ModRegisters.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.RecommendedMethod
      Marks a method as being the recommended method to use.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.ShouldSuperInSubclasses
      Tells the user that they should super this method in subclasses.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.Temprorary
      Marks a feature as not being permanent.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.TODO
      Tells readers that you still want to add something.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.UnstableLibrary
      Like @UnstableMod, but only for Libraries.
      static interface  MPIAnnotations.UnstableMod
      Marks a mod as being an unstable mod.
